description: This file defines a RecyclerView Adapter class for displaying menu items in an Android food delivery app. It manages item views, handles user interactions such as adding items to cart, favoriting, and opening reviews, and manages view binding.

classes.name: MenuItemAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for binding MenuItem data to RecyclerView items, handling user interactions, and managing differential updates.

classes.name: Diff
classes.description: DiffUtil.ItemCallback implementation for calculating differences between MenuItem objects to optimize list updates.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class holding references to view components for a menu item, manages view binding and user interaction handling.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates item view layout and creates ViewHolder instances.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from MenuItem to the ViewHolder and sets up user interaction callbacks.
